age.definition:
The age of the subject since birth. E.g. P19,
         or 5 days.

birthday.definition:
The birthday. Age can be inferred from the
         date of recording.

comment.definition:
A general comment on a specific
         subject.

conact_information.definition: How to get in contact with this subject.

definition:
The investigated experimental subject (animal or person).
      May contain the Cell and Preparation sections as subsections.

developmental_stage.definition: The developemtal stage of the subject. E.g. "embroyonal", "adult", "larval" etc.

genus.definition:
The Genus of the studied
         subject.

health_status.definition:
Information about the health status of this
         subject.

label.definition:
If the subject has been labled in a specific
         way. The lable can be described here.

population.definition:
The population this subject is offspring
         of. This may be the bee hive, the ant colony,
         etc.

size.definition: The size of the subject. This value may be used context dependent. Size could be length for a fish, heigth for a human subject, or shoulder height for a horse etc...

species.definition:
The scientific name of the species e.g. Apis
         mellifera, Homo sapiens.

strain.definition:
The strain the subject was taken from. E.g. a
         specific genetic variation etc.

trivial_name.definition:
The trivial name of the species like
         Honeybee, Human.
